basic.description: In this course, students learn pathophysiology, diagnosis, and management of common problems in general surgery, otolaryngology, orthopedics, OB/GYN, urology, and neurosurgery in hospital and out-patient settings.
basic.subject: BCC
basic.title: Surgery Clerkship

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Satisfactory completion of all year-one and year-two curricula.
